rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment provides a factual description of symptoms/impacts, not high-potency framing.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports symptoms in birds.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
The segment describes symptoms, not capabilities or preparedness.
The segment describes symptoms, not prices or numerical metrics.
The segment describes symptoms, not speculation about future relief.
No direct quote or attributed statement providing a dominant frame.
Factual description of symptoms/impacts without explicit framing.
